title: CLIMBING CENTER
subtitle: WE CLIMB FOR YOUR MOUNTAIN LIFE
description: Experience one of the world's largest and most modern climbing facilities. With over 2,000 square meters of climbing and bouldering space, we offer routes for all skill levels.

services.name: CLIMBING
services.description: Over 200 routes from beginner to expert level

services.name: BOULDERING
services.description: World-class bouldering area with dynamic routes

services.name: TRAINING
services.description: Dedicated training area with campus boards and hangboards

services.name: BISTRO
services.description: Healthy food and refreshments for climbers
